description:
The Count of Monte Cristo claims another victim, but Kindaichi has this mystery solved. Will he be able to reveal the answer before he`s arrested for murder?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindaichi Shounen no Kesshi Gyou File. 3
The Death March of Young Kindaichi, File 3
Voie sans retour pour Kindaichi ! Dossier 3
金田一少年の決死行 File.3
